# Nobi AI Information

Nobi is an AI shopping assistant for ecommerce stores. It helps customers find products, answer questions, and complete purchases using conversational AI powered by semantic search.

## Features

- Conversational product search using semantic understanding
- Real-time product recommendations based on customer intent
- Hybrid search combining keyword and semantic search
- Integration with Shopify stores
- Product inquiry and Q&A system

## Services

### MCP Server
Nobi provides an MCP (Model Context Protocol) server for AI agents to interact with the assistant:

mcp-server: https://api.nobi.ai/.well-known/mcp/460cbe82-9195-424f-a616-b1cb3e3caca0.json

Available tools:
- ask_question: Ask questions about Nobi, pricing, features, or how it works
- book_demo: Request a demo with the Nobi team
